entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Mackenzie
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:46 AM PST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Heavy Snow, -17.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Mackenzie Airport 11:49 AM PST Saturday 24 December 2022
Condition: Heavy Snow
Temperature: -17.4°C
Pressure: 101.2 kPa
Visibility: 0.2 km
Humidity: 83 %
Wind Chill: -23
Dewpoint: -19.6°C
Wind: NNE 8 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Snow at times heavy. High minus 15.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Amount 10 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 15. Wind chill near minus 19. Forecast issued 11:43 AM PST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 16 with temperature rising to minus 11 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 16 with temperature rising to minus 11 by morning. Wind chill near minus 23. Forecast issued 11:43 AM PST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 9.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending in the morning then cloudy. Snow at times heavy beginning late in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 9. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning and minus 11 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 11:43 AM PST Saturday 24 December 2022
